revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Phaophi ... from the village of the Oxyrhynchite nome ... (X acknowledges that he has sold) to Antonius, Asklepiades' son, eight aruras or thereabouts from the share of the old vineyard ... and one arura of the barren ... (the whole of which is adjoined by) ... from the brick, and as much of ... Seirion and ... and ... acknowledging (that he has sold) one arura of the vineyard ... and for the share belonging to ... (he acknowledges that he has received) the price (mutually) agreed on: one talent and three thousand drachmae ... Ionados acknowledging, according to the share ... and according to the contract drawn up at the (record office) at the city of the Oxyrhynchi ...
